page.title: 06The Gamekeeper
page.content: On Monday afternoon we went to Scarcliffe Woods.We went to a gamekeepers house.The gamekeeper said that he kept one thousand six hundred pheasant chicks.He fed them on crumbs,pellets and grit.He became a gamekeeper in 1936 part_time and 1950 full_time.The gamekeeper starts work at 0530 hrs.He is seventy five years old but does not want to retire from his job.His birds are kept in a shed.He said that foxes and cats are a problem.On the Thursday up to Christmas they hold a Christmas Shoot.It is very exciting.On the way back to school we saw two hares.One was running and the other was sitting down.
